channel.title: Posts on Logan Shiller
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Logan Shiller

item.title: Welcome
item.description: About me I am a soon to be graduate of UT. Clearly, I am very excited about the whole thing.I thought it would be fun to share a recipe that I recently tried. My all time favorite food is probably mac and cheese. Using r I have calcualted the metric measurements for ingredients. Using python I have shown how the two can "talk" to eachother, using an example from class.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
